doc.field: Herbert H. Lehman letter to Jacob Billikopf
Herbert H. Lehman letter to Jacob Billikopf

Typed, signed letter from Herbert H. Lehman, on his stationery, to Jacob Billikopf at the Federation of Jewish Charities in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Lehman, then Lieutenant Governor-elect of New York, acknowledges Billikopf's "wonderful" friendship and expresses gratitude for his help in the election. Though not specific as to the nature of that help, Lehman considered it a valuable contribution to the vote in New York City and upstate. For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
